title.rendered: Wyndham Simplifies Group Travel, Brings Instant Booking to 5,600+ U.S. Hotels

content.rendered:
A win for travel planners and managers, real-time rates and availability go live across industry’s largest portfolio of economy and midscale hotels

PARSIPPANY, N.J., Feb. 12, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Group bookings across the industry’s largest portfolio of economy and midscale hotels will soon take minutes—not days—thanks to Groups360 and the rapid rollout of over 5,600 Wyndham hotels to the GroupSync Marketplace.

The shift is a welcome change not just for traditional travel planners (think meetings, weddings and events) but also travel managers, particularly those in infrastructure-centric fields like construction and logistics, whose crews need to spend weeks if not months on the job, often with as little as 24-hour’s notice.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wyndham-simplifies-group-travel-brings-instant-booking-to-5-600-us-hotels-302059193.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
